subject: Re: nroff errors in 3.0.35a version of smb.conf.5
body:
On Jun 4, 2007, at 12:52 PM, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:

> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> James Peach wrote:
>> Hi Jerry,
>>
>> Did you change your DocBook build system for the 3.0.25a
>> release?
>
> The server was upgraded from Ubuntu Edgy to Feisty.

There must be something different/broken about that docBook install.  
smb.conf(5) shows XML entities when viewed with man(1) on my Ubuntu  
6.10 system as well.

Any idea how to track this down?

--
James Peach | jpeach@samba.org
